newsitem.title: POLAND: UNDERWRITERS TAKE MOST NEW BYTOM SHARES.
newsitem.headline: UNDERWRITERS TAKE MOST NEW BYTOM SHARES.

text.p: The Polish garment maker ZO Bytom SA sold its entire 250,000-share new offering, with uderwriters taking up 145,838 shares, the company said in a statement.
It said that during the October 2-16 subscription bids for 250,000 shares priced at 27 zlotys were placed and all 392 subscribers who placed bids have been alloted shares.

The state-owned Bank Handlowy SA underwrote the entire 250,000 share offering at a 13-percent discount and with a stand-by fee of five percent. The shares were offered in a large investor 150,000-share tranche and a 100,000-share retail tranche. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
